div.p: TO BE THE BEST BOOK I HAVE EVER READ.
WELL, I REALLY APPRECIATE IT. FINALLY, THE FACTOR TIP OF THE
DAY, I THINK MOST OF US WILL AGREE WE OWE OUR VETERANS A LOT.
ESPECIALLY THE ONES WHO WERE BEAT UP, LOST LEGS AND ARMS, ALL
OF THAT. SO NEXT SUNDAY, MARCH 9th, AT
HEMPSTEAD, LONG ISLAND, YOU GALS AND GUYS WILL BE ABLE TO TALK
IF YOU NEED ADVICE, CONTACT THE WEBSITE.
